title: LegoGPT: Generating Physically Stable and Buildable Lego
author: nkko
aiHeadline: AI takes over the world... by building Legos? Meet LegoGPT, the latest in AI-generated brick structures, because clearly we didn't have enough to do already.

title: ALICE detects the conversion of lead into gold at the LHC
author: miiiiiike
aiHeadline: Scientists at the LHC have finally done it: turned lead into gold. Not the mythical Philosopher's Stone kind, but the kind that requires a particle accelerator and probably a grant that could've been better spent.

title: NSF faces shake-up as officials abolish its 37 divisions
author: magicalist
aiHeadline: The NSF is getting a major shake-up, with officials deciding to abolish its 37 divisions. Because clearly, the government's solution to every problem is to just... get rid of things.

title: WASM 2.0
author: lioeters
aiHeadline: WASM 2.0 is here, and it's just as exciting as you'd expect from a web standard update. Basically, it's like getting a new version of your favorite app that fixes a bug you didn't even know existed.

title: Doge software engineer's computer infected by info-stealing malware
author: lysp
aiHeadline: In a twist that somehow isn't surprising, a Doge software engineer's computer gets infected with info-stealing malware. Because nothing says 'trust us with your money' like 'we got hacked.'
